title: Mathematical Sans-Serif Italic Capital Z improper .to_lowercase functionality.
body:
<!--
Thank you for filing a bug report! 🐛 Please provide a short summary of the bug,
along with any information you feel relevant to replicating the bug.
-->

I tried this code:

```rust
fn main()
{
    let string_lowercase = String::from("𝘡𝘳𝘦").to_lowercase();
    println!("{}",string_lowercase);
}
```

I expected to see this happen: The Mathematical Sans-Serif Italic Capital Z should have become Mathematical Sans-Serif Italic Small Z.

Instead, this happened: It is still Mathematical Sans-Serif Italic Capital Z.

### Meta
<!--
If you're using the stable version of the compiler, you should also check if the
bug also exists in the beta or nightly versions.
-->
Bug exists in Stable, Beta, and Nightly.

`rustc --version --verbose`:
```
rustc 1.61.0 (fe5b13d68 2022-05-18)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: fe5b13d681f25ee6474be29d748c65adcd91f69e
commit-date: 2022-05-18
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.61.0
LLVM version: 14.0.0
```
